[[Billy Jackson]] |website = |imdb = [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0001392/ Profile] |people = }} '''Sir Peter Robert Jackson''' ([[31 October|October 31]], [[1961]]) is a [[New Zealand]]-born Academy Award-winning director, screenwriter and producer.He is one of the co-creators of [[Wētā FX]], formerly known as ''Weta Digital''. He directed, co-wrote and produced [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' trilogy]] and [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' trilogy]]. ==Roles== [[File:Peter Jackson.jpg|thumb|''Peter Jackson'' at San Diego ComicCon in 2009]] * [[2001]]: ''[[Quest for the Ring]]'' - Himself * [[2001]]: ''[[A Passage to Middle-earth: Making of Lord of the Rings]]'' - Himself * [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - [[Albert Dreary]] * [[2002]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' - Rohirrim Warrior * [[2002]]: ''[[A Day in the Life of a Hobbit]]'' - Himself * [[2002]]: ''[[Scale]]'' - Himself * [[2001]]: ''[[The Making of The Lord of the Rings]]'' - Himself * [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' - Mercenary on Boat * [[2003]]: ''[[Bogans]]'' - Himself * [[2003]]: ''[[The Long and Short of It]]'' - Bus Driver * [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Quest Fulfilled]]'' - Himself * [[2003]]: ''[[Beyond the Movie: The Return of the King|Beyond the Movie - The Lord of the Rings: Return of the King]]'' - Himself * [[2003]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: Origins of Middle-Earth]]'' - Himself * [[2003]]: ''[[From Book to Script: Finding the Story]]'' - Himself * [[2004]]: ''[[DNZ: The Real Middle Earth]]'' - Himself * [[2005]]: ''[[Lord of the Brush]]'' -
